system.effect: The blow opens up a long wound in the target's torso, causing him to double over in terrible pain. The target is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Body (Severity 4)

The blow opens up a long wound in the target's torso, causing him to double over in terrible pain. The target is Stunned for 1 round and suffers Blood Loss.
